vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.3.31;
father of: Shamgar (H8044)
§ Anath = "answer"
father of Shamgar
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Samgar, juez de Israel
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "答案"
珊迦的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "答案"
珊迦的父亲
